title: Theo Fennell
body:
# The Fennell

## The Task

We were asked to create a corporate campaign that raised the profile of the Theo Fennell brand because it was listing on the London Stock Exchange.

## The Solution

We created a fashion campaign for maximum impact. Each advertisement featured a different collection from Theoâ€™s range to demonstrate the breadth of his designs.

## The Results

The campaign raised awareness, created favourable press coverage in relevant financial and fashion publications and increased sales of the jewellery featured in the advertisements.
